name: Nuclear Bomber
description:
In Nuclear Bomber, You are a F-16 fighter pilot. Your mission is to repel the enemy invasion. Tactical atomic weapons are authorized. It's gonna be fun on the bun !

The bombs and other objects in the game use 2D realistic physics.

F-16 Armament :
-----------------
Default
* Mark 82 – 500 pounds Bombs
* Tactical nuclear weapon.

Optional
* AIM-9 Sidewinder guided short-range air-to-air missiles.
* AGM-65 Maverick tactical air-to-surface missiles.
* Flare for enemy guided missiles

Game Objects :
---------------
-Air defence systems,
-AWACS
-Anti air vehicles
-Tank
-Enemy plane,
-Guided missiles
-Missile
-Bomb (can drops multiple bombs)
-Nuclear Bomb
-Barracks
-Leaderboard

See "Nuclear Bomber Full" version for more features.(New Jets,weapons)
-----------------------------------------------------
